Reviews.Title: False Advertisement
Reviews.Author: Bussy
Reviews.Content: This iphone4 cost me twenty dollars in gas and a day's work trying to get this phone fixed. I went back and forth from an apple store and my service provider. Apple gave me a new phone because the one I purchased was still under warranty. After spending all day trying to get the phone to work the apple service rep went in the back room and got the original phone and did a history check from the original owner up until I got the phone. Status unlocked: False. The apple rep told me they could not change the status of the phone they were required to return my new phone with the same set up as the old phone. The apple rep said until the person or company I got the phone from change the settings to factory unlocked there would not be anything I could do with this phone. I sent an email to Amazon about the problem and they were going to contact the provider with this issue. To date I have heard nothing from the provider or Amazon. If I could rate the product with a zero star I would. Right now I have spent over three hundred dollars out of my pocket and lost a day's work. The best thing I could do with this phone is make a boat anchor with it but it would not even be good for that. I found out by trying to save money it would have been better just to buy a new phone. I guess the old saying holds true you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: mskgarmon
Reviews.Content: I recieved my Iphone4 in the mail and was so excited to see that it was practically brand new. No scratches, no visible defects just like as the description said. I love it and I would order again from the seller!

Reviews.Title: It's good, shipping soon.
Reviews.Author: Khoi
Reviews.Content: It's good. Shipping is soon. The customer service is excellent.Prompt delivery. everything came as described and now my phone works and it didn't cost me a fortune or a new phone.

Reviews.Content: Please do not buy anything from this person, this individual does not stand by hind there product.  I bought a Fitbit from this person and it stop working after three months.  The customer service was the worst very.

Reviews.Title: Love my iphone 4!
Reviews.Author: lenartd
Reviews.Content: This iphone is wonderful, and I saved a lot buying from this vendor.  Delivered quickly and works fine!  I uploaded all my "stuff" from iphone 3 in a jiffy with no snags or problems.

Reviews.Title: Shipping slow but product perfect
Reviews.Author: Daniel B. Dickinson
Reviews.Content: Shipping was slow.iPhone was as stated.Do not pay for rush. May be a day or two before it goes out door.

Reviews.Content: I'm pissed, I didn't even get the freaking order.. it took the money out of my account, but I never got it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: evelyn valdez
Reviews.Content: I love my iPhone 4 . Is just what I need it. Everything work perfectly . I recommend this phone to everyone.

Reviews.Content: It is not opened, because it is a gift, so I have not used it.I need to wait for my friend told me that you like it and feel used.

Reviews.Title: I feel cheated and deceived by this situation
Reviews.Author: mendez
Reviews.Content: This is to indicate that the product sold by you (CELL APPLE IPHONE 4 8GB WHITE), has multiple fractures at the level of the housing on the front and rear. Importantly, I have been waiting for this product from the 18/04/13 to give a gift to my daughter and I find this inconvenient.It is right that before dispatching the product to be reviewed, and that came in very, very bad shape, so I causes additional expense here in Venezuela for repair. I feel cheated and deceived by this situation.I would like an answer to this from you.
